description: A sterile gauze pad reinforced by a length of gauze bandage.  Used for bleed control and protecting wounds from aggravation to help them heal faster.  The bandage helps apply additional pressure to the wound, improving bleed control properties.  Only somewhat less effective than commercial options.

use_action.//bandages_power: same bandage power (i.e., healing effect on the wound) as a regular bandage in the base game

description: A sterile gauze pad held firmly in place by medical tape wrapping around the limb.  The application of strong pressure, while generally not recommended with medical tape, aids in stemming severe bleeding in an emergency.  Not quite as effective as commercial options, this may save your life in a survival situation.
//weight: weight of 6× 5-in. strips of medical tape + a gauze pad
//volume: volume of 6× 5-in. strips of medical tape + a gauze pad
